mapper.sql: Id, ProjectName, AddressId, AddressDetail, CreateTime, CompanyId, CreateUser, Principal
mapper.insert: insert into t_project (Id, ProjectName, AddressId, AddressDetail, CreateTime, CompanyId, CreateUser, Principal) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_project
Id,
ProjectName,
AddressId,
AddressDetail,
CreateTime,
CompanyId,

Principal,

mapper.update:
update t_project
ProjectName = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AddressId = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AddressDetail = #{addressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CompanyId = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CreateUser = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Principal = #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_project set ProjectName = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AddressId = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AddressDetail = #{addressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CompanyId = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateUser = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Principal = #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from t_project c
where 1=1
and c.id = #{id}
and c.ProjectName like concat ('%', #{projectName},'%')
and c.AddressId like concat ('%', #{addressId},'%')
